title: Flintar True HEPA Replacement Filter, Compatible with TaoTronics TT-AP002 Air Purifier and VAVA VA-EE008 Air Purifier, 3-in-1 Premium H13 Grade True HEPA Filter, 1-Pack (1)
features: Contains One (1) premium high-efficiency 3-in-1 True HEPA filtration system including Pre-filter, Activated Carbon Filter, and H13 True HEPA Filter. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Pre-filter traps larger particles in the air like hair, dust, pet fur, lint and more
Activated Carbon Filter absorbs household odors from pets, cooking, smoking, wildfire and harmful VOC’s
H13 Grade True HEPA Filter captures 99.97% of airborne particles down to 0.3 microns in size, creating fresh and purified air for you and your family
Easy to replace and disposable, no tools required. Replace every 3-6 months for optimal performance
description: This premium 3-in-1 H13 Grade True HEPA Filtration System is fully compatible with TaoTronics TT-AP002True HEPA H13 Air Purifier and VAVA VA-EE008 This True HEPA Filter System contains 3-stage filtration:   -
Traps larger particles in the air like hair, dust, pet fur, lint and more  -
Genuine H13 Grade True HEPA Filter:
Captures 99.97% of airborne particles down to 0.3 microns in size, creating fresh and purified air for you and your family   -
Absorbs household odors from pets, cooking, smoking, wildfire and harmful VOC’s
Fully Compatible with the following Air Purifiers:

- TaoTronics TT-AP002 True HEPA H13 Air Purifier  - VAVA VA-EE008 Air Purifier Using high efficiency air cleaner filters and replacing the filters regularly will help optimize air cleaning performance. Replace your 3-in-1 True HEPA Filter System every 3-6 months depending on usage and the air quality for optimal performance.     Disclaimer:  * VAVA is the registered trademark of the original manufacturers. Any use of VAVA brand name and model designation is made solely for the purposes of demonstrating compatibility.
